Attributes.description: Investigation of issues and topics in digital media and visual culture through the production of contemporary video art. Technical instruction in video manipulation software. Individual and/or group projects.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of VISA 210, VISA 287, FINA 287.
